name: Subterranean Prison
description: I made three deathmatch wads a while ago and finally decided to release them to the idgames ftp. This is one of them. In this map, you're going to be fighting in a subterranean prison with a central arena and dark tunnels around the cells. Teleport to the rocket launcher or SSG and then drop to the arena to play with your new toy. Weapons 3-5 are in the map for you to fight with.
